channel.title: Project on Citizen Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Citizen Labs

item.title: FY2018 Budget Added to Open Budget: GR
item.description: Interested in the City of Grand Rapids’ budget, but don’t have time to thumb through the 326 page document? A great place to start in learning more about the nearly $530 Million budget is by visiting Open Budget: Grand Rapids. What’s New? Open Budget: Grand Rapids now includes the FY2018 budget information that was approved by the City Council in June 2017. An interactive timeline of the budget process. This makes it much easier to know when departments make their requests and when citizens can make their voices heard at public hearings.
